verses.verse: And the whole congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> assembled together <WH6950> at Shiloh <WH7887>, and set up <WH7931> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> there. And the land <WH776> was subdued <WH3533> before <WH6440> them.
And there remained <WH3498> among the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> seven <WH7651> tribes <WH7626>, which had not yet received <WH2505> their inheritance <WH5159>.

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, How long are ye slack <WH7503> to go <WH935> to possess <WH3423> the land <WH776>, which the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of your fathers <WH1> hath given <WH5414> you?

Give out <WH3051> from among you three <WH7969> men <WH582> for each tribe <WH7626>: and I will send <WH7971> them, and they shall rise <WH6965>, and go <WH1980> through the land <WH776>, and describe <WH3789> it according <WH6310> to the inheritance <WH5159> of them; and they shall come <WH935> again to me.

And they shall divide <WH2505> it into seven <WH7651> parts <WH2506>: Judah <WH3063> shall abide <WH5975> in their coast <WH1366> on the south <WH5045>, and the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130> shall abide <WH5975> in their coasts <WH1366> on the north <WH6828>.

Ye shall therefore describe <WH3789> the land <WH776> into seven <WH7651> parts <WH2506>, and bring <WH935> the description hither to me, that I may cast <WH3384> lots <WH1486> for you here before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430>.

But the Levites <WH3881> have no part <WH2506> among <WH7130> you; for the priesthood <WH3550> of the LORD <WH3068> is their inheritance <WH5159>: and Gad <WH1410>, and Reuben <WH7205>, and half <WH2677> the tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519>, have received <WH3947> their inheritance <WH5159> beyond <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383> on the east <WH4217>, which Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the LORD <WH3068> gave <WH5414> them.

And the men <WH582> arose <WH6965>, and went away <WH3212>: and Joshua <WH3091> charged <WH6680> them that went <WH1980> to describe <WH3789> the land <WH776>, saying <WH559>, Go <WH3212> and walk <WH1980> through the land <WH776>, and describe <WH3789> it, and come again <WH7725> to me, that I may here cast <WH7993> lots <WH1486> for you before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> in Shiloh <WH7887>.

And the men <WH582> went <WH3212> and passed through <WH5674> the land <WH776>, and described <WH3789> it by cities <WH5892> into seven <WH7651> parts <WH2506> in a book <WH5612>, and came <WH935> again to Joshua <WH3091> to the host <WH4264> at Shiloh <WH7887>.

And Joshua <WH3091> cast <WH7993> lots <WH1486> for them in Shiloh <WH7887> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068>: and there Joshua <WH3091> divided <WH2505> the land <WH776> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> according to their divisions <WH4256>.

And the lot <WH1486> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> came up <WH5927> according to their families <WH4940>: and the coast <WH1366> of their lot <WH1486> came forth <WH3318> between the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> and the children <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130>.

And their border <WH1366> on the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> was from Jordan <WH3383>; and the border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> to the side <WH3802> of Jericho <WH3405> on the north <WH6828> side, and went up <WH5927> through the mountains <WH2022> westward <WH3220>; and the goings out <WH8444> thereof were at the wilderness <WH4057> of Bethaven <WH1007>.

And the border <WH1366> went over <WH5674> from thence toward Luz <WH3870>, to the side <WH3802> of Luz <WH3870>, which is Bethel <WH1008>, southward <WH5045>; and the border <WH1366> descended <WH3381> to Atarothadar <WH5853>, near the hill <WH2022> that lieth on the south side <WH5045> of the nether <WH8481> Bethhoron <WH1032>.

And the border <WH1366> was drawn <WH8388> thence, and compassed <WH5437> the corner <WH6285> of the sea <WH3220> southward <WH5045>, from the hill <WH2022> that lieth before <WH6440> Bethhoron <WH1032> southward <WH5045>; and the goings out <WH8444> thereof were at Kirjathbaal <WH7154>, which is Kirjathjearim <WH7157>, a city <WH5892> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>: this was the west <WH3220> quarter <WH6285>.

And the south <WH5045> quarter <WH6285> was from the end <WH7097> of Kirjathjearim <WH7157>, and the border <WH1366> went out <WH3318> on the west <WH3220>, and went out <WH3318> to the well <WH4599> of waters <WH4325> of Nephtoah <WH5318>:

And the border <WH1366> came down <WH3381> to the end <WH7097> of the mountain <WH2022> that lieth before <WH6440> the valley <WH1516> of the son <WH1121> of Hinnom <WH2011>, and which is in the valley <WH6010> of the giants <WH7497> on the north <WH6828>, and descended <WH3381> to the valley <WH1516> of Hinnom <WH2011>, to the side <WH3802> of Jebusi <WH2983> on the south <WH5045>, and descended <WH3381> to Enrogel <WH5883>,

And was drawn <WH8388> from the north <WH6828>, and went forth <WH3318> to Enshemesh <WH5885>, and went forth <WH3318> toward Geliloth <WH1553>, which is over against <WH5227> the going up <WH4608> of Adummim <WH131>, and descended <WH3381> to the stone <WH68> of Bohan <WH932> the son <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205>,
And passed along <WH5674> toward the side <WH3802> over against <WH4136> Arabah <WH6160> northward <WH6828>, and went down <WH3381> unto Arabah <WH6160>: Arabah: or, the plain

And the border <WH1366> passed along <WH5674> to the side <WH3802> of Bethhoglah <WH1031> northward <WH6828>: and the outgoings <WH8444> of the border <WH1366> were at the north <WH6828> bay <WH3956> of the salt <WH4417> sea <WH3220> at the south <WH5045> end <WH7097> of Jordan <WH3383>: this was the south <WH5045> coast <WH1366>. bay: Heb. tongue

And Jordan <WH3383> was the border <WH1379> of it on the east <WH6924> side <WH6285>. This was the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144>, by the coasts <WH1367> thereof round about <WH5439>, according to their families <WH4940>.

Now the cities <WH5892> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> according to their families <WH4940> were Jericho <WH3405>, and Bethhoglah <WH1031>, and the valley <WH6010> of Keziz <WH7104>,
And Betharabah <WH1026>, and Zemaraim <WH6787>, and Bethel <WH1008>,
And Avim <WH5761>, and Parah <WH6511>, and Ophrah <WH6084>,
And Chepharhaammonai <WH3726>, and Ophni <WH6078>, and Gaba <WH1387>; twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>:
Gibeon <WH1391>, and Ramah <WH7414>, and Beeroth <WH881>,
And Mizpeh <WH4708>, and Chephirah <WH3716>, and Mozah <WH4681>,
And Rekem <WH7552>, and Irpeel <WH3416>, and Taralah <WH8634>,

And Zelah <WH6762>, Eleph <WH507>, and Jebusi <WH2983>, which is Jerusalem <WH3389>, Gibeath <WH1394>, and Kirjath <WH7157>; fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>. This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> according to their families <WH4940>.
